name: Kick Assteroids
description:
Kick Assteroids is a small game I made over a weeked. It combines old school asteroids style game play with tower defense. Fight off enemies, destroy asteroids, prevent your satellite from being destroyed, get cool power ups and maybe a few Aliens references! Kick Assteroids has 2 different modes to play, survival and defend. In survival your goal is to survive as long as you can against an endless supply of enemies and asteroids. In defend your goal is to defend your satellite from attacking enemy ships and asteroids. Charge up your satellites power to fire a huge wave of energy, destroying anything in its path!

Controls:
Mouse to click your game type
Left and right arrows to rotate ship
Up arrow to accelerate
Down Arrow to brake
Hold Space Bar to shoot
"Q" to quit the game at any time.
